entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 13 except minus 6 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13 except minus 6 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023
